name: Ping Pong Bouncing paradise
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace jam  #21 :bouncing

 the game genre is brick breaker game.  

the scoring system is getting the  maximum numbers of gems without loosing your ball.  Second possibility for playing : get maximum number of gems until you give up. 

Gameplay:  style 1972 brick breaker game. 

Theme:  ball is bouncing  on walls , bricks...

Aesthetics: all  Ui graphics using blue color for the game.

Sound:  stereo left /right when the ball is touching left or right wall.  

known bug to be fixed : paddle not correctly  adapting to every  screen size.

cheat code activation: press space to get a new ball in case of a bug :)
